text: Sir Kenneth Duncan "Ken" Morrison CBE (20 October 1931 - 1 February 2017) was an English businessman. He was the Life President and former chairman of Morrisons (Wm Morrison Supermarkets PLC), the fourth largest supermarket group in the United Kingdom since 1956. Morrison died on 1 February 2017 from a short-illness at his home in Myton-on-Swale, North Yorkshire, aged 85. ==References== ==Other websites== *Morrisons *Leeds University Category:1931 births Category:2017 deaths Category:English businesspeople Category:People from West Yorkshire
title: Ken Morrison
